resources.content: Users only get to access contents that has beem verified by the admin. Admin checks for abuses in contents before allowing them to go live. In chances of users finding irrelevant or abusive contents on the app is very low.

We provide a very interactive interface for user's to filter contents based on multiple criterias, these criterias helps us to tailor the contents recommended to users to exactly what they intend to see.

We took advantage of cutting edge technologies including, up to date tools, high performance design patterns and so on, to ensure a seamless user experience. As a result of these, we are able to deliver high quality content to users and a pleasurable speed.
